last_checked_tag:
5.0.1

New in version 5.0.1
--------------------
Many Java editor bug fixes, fix ctrl-click on Mac,
new support for opening text files in BlueJ.

BlueJ 4.2.0 and later require a 64-bit operating system. Any users
who are running a 64-bit operating system are encouraged to
upgrade.  Users of 32-bit operating systems must remain on version
4.1.4 or earlier.
